question: Which country has inaugurated Southeast Asiaâ€™s largest solar power farm?
explanation: Vietnam has recently inaugurated Southeast Asia\'s largest solar power farm which has the capacity to produce 688 million kWh of electricity annually. The Dau Tieng Solar Power Complex is constructed on the Dau Tieng Reservoir - the largest artificial lake in Vietnam - and is expected to generate 10% of the country\'s solar energy to guarantee supply to 320,000 homes.
